credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
title: Robe
description: Red and white vertically striped velvet robe with a polka dot lining. Tight fitting bodice and deep set sleeves narrowing to the wrist. Edged with black cotton twill that is machine stitched in light blue and white.
name: Robe
